languages.text: "А жрать они, наверное, будут песок, который добывают! Вот же придурь — поднимать восстание на пустынной каменюке".
"And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"
languages.original_text: "А жрать они, наверное, будут песок, который добывают! Вот же придурь — поднимать восстание на пустынной каменюке".

traits.locale_text: "And I take it they're fine with the sand being their only food out here? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"
"And I take it they're fine with the sand being their only food out here? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"
"And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"
"And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"
"And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"
"And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"

languages.text: «¿Y que pretenden alimentarse a base de arena y grava? ¿Qué clase de lunático iniciaría una revuelta en un terreno baldío?».
languages.original_text: "And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y que pretenden alimentarse a base de arena y grava? ¿Qué clase de lunático iniciaría una revuelta en un terreno baldío?».

languages.text: "Und ich gehe davon aus, sie freuen sich auf eine Ernährung aus Sand und Kies? Welcher Wahnsinnige würde denn auf einem öden Felsen eine Revolte anzetteln?"
languages.original_text: "And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"

traits.locale_text: "Und ich gehe davon aus, sie freuen sich auf eine Ernährung aus Sand und Kies? Welcher Wahnsinnige würde denn auf einem öden Felsen eine Revolte anzetteln?"

languages.text: « Et quoi, ils vont se mettre à manger du sable et du gravier ? Il faut être complètement fou pour lancer une révolte sur un caillou aussi desséché. »
languages.original_text: "And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"

traits.locale_text: « Et quoi, ils vont se mettre à manger du sable et du gravier ? Il faut être complètement fou pour lancer une révolte sur un caillou aussi desséché. »

languages.text: “我猜他们是打算吃土吧？什么样的疯子才会在一大片破石头上造反？”
languages.original_text: "And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"

traits.locale_text: “我猜他们是打算吃土吧？什么样的疯子才会在一大片破石头上造反？”

languages.text: 「それで、彼らは砂と砂利の食事を楽しみにしているのかしら？不毛の岩の大地で暴動だなんて、どんなイカれ野郎なの？」
languages.original_text: "And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"

traits.locale_text: 「それで、彼らは砂と砂利の食事を楽しみにしているのかしら？不毛の岩の大地で暴動だなんて、どんなイカれ野郎よ？」
「それで、彼らは砂と砂利の食事を楽しみにしているのかしら？不毛の岩の大地で暴動だなんて、どんなイカれ野郎なの？」

languages.text: "Anladığım kadarıyla da taş toprak yemeyi planlıyorlar. Ne tür bir manyak, çorak bir yerde isyan başlatır ki?"
languages.original_text: "And I take it they're looking forward to a diet of sand and gravel? What kind of madman would start a revolt on a barren rock?"

traits.locale_text: "Anladığım kadarıyla da taş toprak yemeyi planlıyorlar. Ne tür bir manyak, çorak bir yerde isyan başlatır ki?"
